sn35.155:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn35.155:4.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.155:4.4: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhammakathiko hotī”ti?
sn35.155:5.1: * “Cakkhussa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṃ deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya.
sn35.155:5.2: Cakkhussa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti, ‘dhammānudhammappaṭipanno bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya.
sn35.155:5.3: Cakkhussa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādāvimutto hoti, ‘diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya … pe …
sn35.155:5.4: jivhāya ce, bhikkhu, nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṃ deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya … pe …
sn35.155:5.5: manassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṃ deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya.
sn35.155:5.6: Manassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti, ‘dhammānudhammappaṭipanno bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya.
sn35.155:5.7: Manassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādāvimutto hoti, ‘diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāyā”ti.
